content: I would highly recommend the electrical services provided by Paul and his team. They have provided electrical services for a range of reasons on a number of occasions over the past few years. Paul is responsive, always on time and always completes the job professionally to a high standard.
title: Client

content: What you expect from any electrician is reliability and competence. What you get from PID Electrical Services is all that, plus professional consulting advice. It works for my business.
title: Client
